job_history.work_description: Experience working special needs students. Promoted language development skills through reading and storytelling. Applied the positive reinforcement method to redirect negative behaviors. Encouraged students to be understanding of and helpful to others. Observed students to supply teachers with feedback regarding potential learning blocks and opportunities for support.

Developed and implemented daily and unit lesson plans for 6th grade English. Developed, administered and corrected tests and quizzes in a timely manner. Conducted group and one-on-one reading and writing activities. Developed excellent rapport with students. Fostered a classroom environment, conducive to learning and promoting excellent student engagement.

Provided state mandated curriculum and created the school's curriculum for 10th grade World History as well as Advanced Placement World History. Developed and implemented daily and unit lesson plans for 10th grade Global History. Provided Regents study habits and skills after-school and on Saturdays.

job_history.role_name: English Language Arts Teacher/Social Studies Teacher
job_history.work_description: Provided state mandated curriculum. Maintained student progress. Maintained student portfolios. Reinforced skills needed to be successful. Developed and implemented daily and unit lesson plans for 6th and 7th grade English.

Provided state and federally mandated classroom presentations. Performed student background reviews to develop tailored lessons based on student needs. Designed lesson plans focused on age and level-appropriate material.

Worked closely with department Assistant Principals. Assisted the Prevention and Intervention Specialists. Worked with individual students in counseling sessions. Worked with students in discussion groups.

skills.name: Teaching
skills.explanation: Over 15 years of experience in teaching various subjects, including English, Social Studies, and World History, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Curriculum Development
skills.explanation: Developed and implemented curricula for multiple grade levels and subjects, showing strong proficiency in curriculum development.

skills.name: Lesson Planning
skills.explanation: Consistently developed and implemented daily and unit lesson plans for various subjects and grade levels, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Classroom Management
skills.explanation: Fostered a classroom environment conducive to learning and promoting excellent student engagement, showing strong proficiency in classroom management.

skills.name: Student Assessment
skills.explanation: Maintained student progress and portfolios, and provided Regents study habits and skills, indicating a solid working proficiency in student assessment.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Worked closely with department Assistant Principals and assisted Prevention and Intervention Specialists, showing some practical experience in leadership.

skills.name: Counseling
skills.explanation: Worked with individual students in counseling sessions and discussion groups, indicating some practical experience in counseling.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Developed excellent rapport with students and provided feedback to teachers, showing a solid working proficiency in communication.
